overview: Welcome to the Haunted Dollhouse, where three terrifying tales await you. Guardian skulls protect a castle, a young girl is possessed by powers unknown, and evil once again springs from the toy box. Beyond these doors, YOU are the plaything. Cast: Robin Sydney, Jessica Morris, Meredith McClain, Tim Thomerson, Tracy Scoggins.  Re-edited versions of:  Dollman VS Demonic Toys /  Dangerous Worry Dolls /  Skullheads
title: The Haunted Dollhouse
